|
| Name probably only refers to J30 of the M25, the junction with the A13, but feeder roads link to J31. Exit to J31 clockwise must be made via J30, and access from J31 anticlockwise also must be made via J30. However, J30 has its own south-facing slips. A282 now starts immediately after the diverge at J30 clockwise.
